alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 2:06PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Callahan and central Taylor Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 205 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Abilene, or near Coronados Camp, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Clyde, Wylie, Tuscola, Buffalo Gap, Lawn, Eula, Dudley, Potosi, View, Coronados Camp, Oplin, Caps, Lake Abilene, Camp Tonkawa, Ovalo and Kirby Lake. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 291 and 301. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
